name: check-lol
title: League of Legends: Wild Rift
description: Memeriksa nama/nickname pemain League of Legends: Wild Rift berdasarkan Riot ID.
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-lol \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"Nama#TAG"}'
